price: Again, how do you know what Judgment Day is?
arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: thumma mā adrāka mā yawmu al-dīni
